title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 3, pt. 445 - School Notifications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 3, pt. 445 - School Notifications

State Regulations
§ 445.1 - School district notification of a foster child placed in a foster boarding home, agency boarding home or group home
§ 445.2 - Confidentiality

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 3, pt. 445

Statutory authority: N.Y. Const., art. XVII, § 2; Education Law, §3202; Executive Law, §§747, 750; Social Services Law, §§20, 34

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
